field.name: minimum distance
field.help: the distance below which this sound no longer gets louder

field.name: maximum distance
field.help: the distance beyond which this sound is no longer audible

field.name: skip fraction
field.help: fraction of requests to play this sound that will be ignored (0 means always play.)

field.name: randomization
field.definition: these settings control random variation of volume and pitch. the second parameter gets clipped to the first.

field.name: gain base
field.help: sound's random gain will start here

field.name: gain variance
field.help: sound's gain will be randomly modulated within this range

field.name: random pitch bounds
field.help: the sound's pitch will be modulated randomly within this range.

field.name: directional sounds
field.definition: these settings allow sounds to be directional, fading as they turn away from the listener

field.name: inner cone angle
field.help: within the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of 1.0.

field.name: outer cone angle
field.help: outside the cone defined by this angle and the sound's direction, the sound plays with a gain of OUTER CONE GAIN. (0 means the sound does not attenuate with direction.)

field.name: outer cone gain
field.help: the gain to use when the sound is directed away from the listener

field.name: SCRIPTED LOCATION OVERRIDE
field.definition: NOTE: this will only apply when the sound is started via script azimuth: 0 => front 90 => left 180 => back 270 => right

field.name: scale modifiers
field.definition: as the sound's input scale changes from zero to one, these modifiers move between the two values specified here. the sound will play using the current scale modifier multiplied by the values specified above. (0 values are ignored.)

field.name: bend bounds
field.help: the range of pitches that will be represented using this sample.

field.name: parameter description
field.definition:
DLS2 filtering: resonance gain range: [0, 22.5] dB
parametric EQ: gain range: [-64, 14] dB
for mono sounds: the left filter controls the DLS 2 parameters the right filter controls the Parametric EQ parameters
for stereo sounds: both left and right channels must have the same filter i.e., filter type both is invalid

field.name: promotion count
field.help: when there are this many instances of the sound, promote to the new sound.

field.name: suppression time
field.help: time from when first permutation plays to when another sound from an equal or lower promotion can play
